message:
could any one help me?
i want to add marker in GIS map with code in windows phone 8?

data.message: Did you search Google with your question?
yes i find it in xaml but i want to make it in c# code
So you want someone to give you some code in c# that does what you're suppose to be doing on your own? Or you've written some code that doesn't work and need help with that?

I remember it was very tricky to do in code, and the documentation and articles for maps on WP8 is generally very bad, I helped someone do it before but I don't have his code, if you want I can let him send me the parts of his code that did this.
i will be very grateful if you send me this code
I just noticed you said "GIS map", I don't know what you mean by GIS, do you use WP8's normal map control (Bing Maps)?
no i use arcmap this a product from arcgis and i want to show this map in windows phone 8 and control the size of the arcmap

The question is so generic, it's difficult to answer it.
There are many mapping platforms on Windows Phone. You need to be more specific about your question, and you should show what you found in research so far.
oh, sorry I misunderstood your question (w 3ala2tak 3al fady w beta3 :S), asl even the default map control isn't easy to use specially when it comes to adding pins from the code.

i will explain my problem from first i make a map with arcmap program belong to esri company and i published it in arcgis for server as aservice and i consume it in my windows phone app and the first problem is that the map comming very small and i can't add pin on this map in windows phone and this is the second problem

Okay, so you're using Esri's stuff. This is very important to know because most people would just assume you're using Bing maps.
To consume ArcGIS Server maps on Windows Phone, use ArcGIS Runtime SDK for Windows Phone
http://resources.arcgis.com/en/communities/windows-phone-sdk/
If you're not using that, it's very difficult to get Esri stuff to work in your app, unless you offer the services as WMS services.
i downloaded this sdk before and used it to bring my map to windows phone but the problem is the size of the map and add pins on it

Still not clear what the problem is. You'll have to explain more than just: "can't add pins".
Did you look at the samples?
http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/windows-phone-sdk/samples/start.htm
Any of these samples look close to what you want to do?
